name: Pink Room
longDes: You are in the pink room. The walls appear faded, almost dusty pink. There is a window to the North through which you can see the rose gardens, a fountain, and the gazebo. The floor is spattered a bit with paint. An easel and small table stand beside the window. There is a loom and some bins filled with cloth along the wall opposite the window. You feel a ringing in your ears as you stand here. A small and steep staircase leads up into the attic. A door to the West leads to the red room. Another door to the East leads to the green room.
shortDes: You are standing in the pink room, which serves as the art studio. You notice an easel and small table near the window.  A loom occupies the room along the wall opposite. A window faces to the north, overlooking the rose garden and gazebo. There is a door to the West leading to the red room, a door to the East leading to the green room, and a steep staircase heading up.

features.name: easel
features.preActionDes: This easel holds a blank canvas. There are also oil paints and brushes next to it. It's ready to be painted.
features.postActionDes: You finish your painting of the dog. Its eyes look dead.

features.name: loom
features.preActionDes: You look at the loom. You're not sure what to do with it.
